recipes: I'm  convinced the Mithraeum holds more secrets. It's unlikely to be dangerous, but the search will require funds. [Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]
A lonely space, musty with the memory of blood. We have found the hidden door the highest grades of initiate used.
The altar tilts back like a jaw. Behind it is the pyramid-space where only the Sun-hunters and Dawn-givers might go. They have left their treasures.
